effect.name: Add Color HSL
effect.description: Add the color components of the given HSL color to the source image.

parameter.name: Hue
parameter.description: The hue component of the color to be added.

parameter.name: Saturation
parameter.description: The saturation component of the color to be added.

parameter.name: Lightness
parameter.description: The lightness component of the color to be added.

parameter.name: Semitransparency
parameter.description: Semitransparency, for applications with premultiplied alphas disabled. Set to 0 for opaque or 1 for fully transparent.

parameter.name: Inverted
parameter.description: Whether to invert the final color for pixels. 0 for no, 1 for yes.
